column4: the alsa drivers used to be in constant flux, and I think they still are.
I had to test 4 or 5 different releases of them to get sound ALMOST working a Fujitsu tablet.
and then it took a wizard to pirate the schematics, understand them and fix the source code for that particolar tablet-notebook to work.
must be quite a kick to see it working for the first time :-)
